messages.content: you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ufulu wa anthu aukalamba

Chapter: 3, Section: 30(b) Anthu achikulire ali ndi ufulu wa chitetezo, kutengela ndi Section 13(b), Chapter 3, lomwe limatsindika kuti boma liyenera kusamalira anthu achikulire powapatsa chitetezo ndi zothandiza pamoyo wawo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nimafuna kudziwa za malamulo a mudziko lino

Chapter: 1, Section: 5, Constitution ndi ndondomeko zazikulu za malamulo, izi zili mu Section 5, Chapter 1 cha Constitution, chomwe chimakhazikitsa Constitution ngati gwero lalikulu la malamulo a dziko.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi amai ndi ana ali ndi ufulu wanji malingana ndi buku la malamulo
Chapter:4, Section: 20, Ali ndi ufulu wofanana ndi chitetezo, kutengela ndi Section 20, Chapter 4, lomwe limapereka chitetezo chofanana kwa aliyense popanda tsankho pazifukwa zilizonse.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ni zoyenera zanji zomwe zimapangitsa munthu kukhala mutsogoleri wa dziko

Chapter: 8, Sectionv 80, Munthu ayenera kukhala ndi zaka 35 ndi kukhala nzika, kutengela ndi Section 80, Chapter 8 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka zofunikira kuti munthu akhale Mutsogoleri wa dziko.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi malamulo amakamba chani pankhani ya amaudindo amumamizi

Chapter 5, Section 146, Malamulo a Malawi akufotokoza amaudindo amumamizi mu Chapter V, Section 146 ya Malawi Constitution, yomwe imapanga malamulo okhudza mmene boma likuyendera. Izi zikuphatikiza kulemekeza ufulu wa anthu ndi kuonetsetsa kuti ntchito zamaboma zimagwira ntchito bwino. Malamulo a Local Government Act (1998) akufotokoza za amaudindo a magulu a anthu mu mamizi. Amamanga malamulo a kasamalidwe ka ndalama komanso njira zothetsera mavuto a anthu. Chifukwa cha izi, amaudindo amumamizi akuyenera kutsatira malamulo ndikulimbikitsa ubwenzi ndi anthu omwe akukhudzidwa.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
anthu opanga mademo ali ndi udindo wanji ngati nzika za malawi muno
Chapter: 4, Section: 38, Ali ndi udindo wopanga ma demo mwamtendere, izi zili mu Section 38, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, komwe kulola kusonkhana mwamtendere.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi ana anga akhoza kupeza maphunziro aulere malinga ni malamulo

Chapter:4, Section: 25, Inde, ana ayenera kupeza maphunziro aulere, malinga ndi Section 25, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti ana ali ndi ufulu wophunzira ndipo boma liyenera kupereka maphunziro.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
mwana akalakisa tisamumenye malingana ndi malamulo
Chapter: 4, Section: 23, Malamulo samalola kumenya ana, izi zili mu Section 23, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limateteza ana ku nkhanza, kuphatikizapo kuwalanga mwankhanza.
